c74object.name: bl.getrange
c74object.digest: Get the range of a number stream
c74object.description: Outputs the running range of a number stream. The numbers can be passed as integers, floats or lists.

inlet.digest: The number stream whose range we want to find out.

outlet.digest: The running minimum and the maximum of the range.

method.name: float
method.digest: The float number stream whose running range should be kept track of.
method.description: The float number stream whose running range should be kept track of.

method.name: long
method.digest: The integer number stream whose running range should be kept track of.
method.description: The integer number stream whose running range should be kept track of.

method.name: list
method.digest: The list of floats or integers whose range should be detected.
method.description: The list of floats or integers whose range should be detected.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset the memory of the running range.
method.description: Reset the memory of the running range.
